column4: I feel that XMMS is similar to WinAMP and AmaroK is similar to iTunes
amaroK has been acting pleasingly like WinAmp for me.  It lacks only a little of its functionality, but amaroK is _SO BLOATED_.
Maybe once I go 32-bit, it won't take 12 seconds to boot.
It's probably my 64bit arch.  Everything is fatter now.
